arts.ttl: Chelsea manager Enzo Maresca insists his side are 'serious and we want to compete' after 5-0 Carabao Cup rout of Barrow as the Blues boss calls on his side to 'send a message' to their rivals
arts.sum: A hat-trick from Christopher Nkunku, who has started only once in the Premier League, put League Two Barrow to the sword while there was a first Chelsea goal for Pedro Neto.

arts.ttl: Chelsea 5-0 Barrow: Player ratings as Blues breeze into Carabao Cup fourth round
arts.sum: The second came seven minutes later as Malo Gusto's low cross again found Nkunku for a delightful flick beyond Paul Farman in the Barrow goal. The momentum of the game continued into the second half and Neto tapped home an electric counter just two minutes after the restart following a smart cross from Mykhailo Mudryk.

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans fume as Sky Sports camera cuts away at worst possible time in Barrow thrashing
arts.sum: Chelsea prevailed 5-0 to progress past League 2 side Barrow in the Carabao Cup with Christopher Nkunku stealing the headlines by recording a hat-trick at Stamford Bridge

arts.ttl: Chelsea 5-0 Barrow: Enzo Maresca reveals pre-match message after EFL Cup demolition
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca reveals that he demanded that his heavily-rotated side send a message to their rivals in their 5-0 victory over Barrow on Tuesday night.
Highlights from the Carabao Cup third round tie between Chelsea and Barrow.

arts.ttl: Chelsea 5-0 Barrow PLAYER RATINGS: Whose finish was Zola-esque? Which new signing struggled early on? And who was a class apart?
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL AT STAMFORD BRIDGE: The Blues had won back-to-back matches going into the tie, with victories over Bournemouth and West Ham welcomed with open arms by Enzo Maresca.

arts.ttl: Christopher Nkunku nets hat-trick as Chelsea thrash Barrow in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Paul Farman scored an own goal while Pedro Neto registered his first goal for the Blues.

arts.ttl: Nkunku bags Chelsea hat-trick as they wheel past Barrow
arts.sum: Christopher Nkunku scored a hat-trick as Chelsea eased into the fourth round of the Carabao Cup by thumping Barrow 5-0.

arts.ttl: Chelsea 5-0 Barrow: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Nkunku hits hat-trick
arts.sum: Christopher Nkunku scores a hat-trick as Chelsea thump Barrow 5-0 in the third round of the EFL Cup at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: No problems for Chelsea as Christopher Nkunku nets hat-trick in Barrow rout
arts.sum: Paul Farman scored an own goal while Pedro Neto registered his first goal for the Blues.
